about_the_game:
FRAY spawned from the story of Tullio and Ziya, two deeply bonded brothers who share a passion for movement, hip hop culture, and a competitive zeal for video games. Their brotherly connection frays as the elder brother Ziya is lured into a wondrous video game world by Lucious, a beguiling AI character he conjures up for a gaming contest.

The contest calls for building a great puzzle game, but as Ziya’s foray into AI blurs the line between real and virtual, the brothers are drawn into a real-life quandary in which restoring the frayed connections of their relationship means confronting the reality that people are the greatest puzzles of all.

The FRAY team invites fans into both worlds through a hip hop dance theatre production, and through a video game for PC's launching on Steam June 15th.

FRAY Game is an imaginative, rhythm based puzzle game in which the player takes control of Tullio to light the way through a maze-like world of isometric dance puzzles and rhythm based challenges.

Along the way, cunning enemies attempt to break the bond between the brothers and seduce Ziya into the underworld forever. By moving to the rhythm and mastering energy-blasting dance routines, Tullio must keep improving his dancing skills to acquire enough energy to carry his ailing brother to the final level’s end - an allegorical home. FRAY Game was built by Herobeat Studios in Barcelona. Unreal Engine.


The FRAY Show is a unique and game-changing new production that intersects hip hop dance theatre with gaming and a conceptual AI world, and is coming to the state of the art stage of Lilian Baylis Studio, Sadlers Wells for an exclusive two night run on Friday 21st and Saturday 22nd June, with tickets on sale now here.



The FRAY Show brings together an innovative team of creators, including writer/Executive Producer/Director Kate Duhamel of Candy Bomber Productions and the Olivier award nominated MC, dancer, director and founder of Breakin’ Convention and maverick hip hop dance pioneer Jonzi D, who is FRAY’s Artistic Director, with music supervision by respected UK hip hop artist Micall Parknsn, live music performed by the award-winning saxophonist, composer and broadcaster Soweto Kinch, with choreography by dance captain Ola Papiór.

name: FRAY Game
short_description: FRAY Game is a rhythm based puzzle game about two brothers Tullio and Ziya. Take control of Tullio to move to the beat and master energy blasting dance moves to light the way through a maze-like world of dance challenges and to battle cunning enemies who attempt to break the bond between brothers.
